hypothesis_content.title: BTC Daily RSI Extreme Reversion in Neutral Regime
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC is in NEUTRAL regime (confidence >55%) and daily RSI(14) exceeds 75 or falls below 25, price will revert toward the 20-day SMA within 3 trading days with >65% probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Neutral regimes exhibit range-bound behavior with mean reversion tendencies. Extreme RSI readings combined with volume confirmation suggest overbought/oversold conditions that correct toward the medium-term average.

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price returns to within 2% of 20-day SMA
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price moves further away from SMA by additional 5% beyond entry deviation

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Success rate <55% over 100+ occurrences across multiple neutral periods, or average holding period >4 days for profitable trades.
